short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension customizes the colour of the DCU Loop page to a dark blue theme.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing ‘DCU Loop - Dark Mode’, a Chrome extension designed to enhance your late-night study sessions on the DCU Loop platform. This extension transforms the blinding white light of the DCU Loop interface into a soothing dark blue theme, making it easier on your eyes and helping you focus on your assignments and lectures without strain.

Why should you install it? If you’re a night owl who prefers studying during the quieter hours, or if you simply want a more comfortable viewing experience on DCU Loop, this extension is for you. With ‘DCU Loop - Dark Mode’, you can say goodbye to eye fatigue and hello to a more relaxed and productive study environment. Try it out today and experience the difference!
